parameter.title: AreaOnAreaOverlayer Parameters
parameter.description: Configure how area overlay analysis is performed

actions.name: AttributeAggregator
actions.description: Regroupe les entités selon leurs attributs

parameter.description: Configure how features are grouped and aggregated based on attribute values

oneOf.title: Maximum Value
oneOf.description: Find the maximum value in the group

oneOf.title: Count Items

parameter.description: Configure which array attributes to join into single values

ignoreAttributes.title: Attributes to Ignore

actions.name: AttributeConversionTable

dataset.title: Dataset URI
dataset.description: Path or URI to external conversion table file

format.title: Table Format
format.description: Format of the conversion table (CSV, TSV, or JSON)

inline.title: Inline Table Data
inline.description: Conversion table data provided directly as string content

rules.title: Conversion Rules
rules.description: List of rules defining how to map attributes using the conversion table

conversionTableKeys.title: Keys to match in conversion table

actions.name: AttributeDuplicateFilter
actions.description: Filtre les entités possédant des attributs dupliqués

filterBy.title: Filter Attributes
filterBy.description: Attributes used to identify duplicate features - features with identical values for these attributes will be deduplicated

attribute.title: Source Path Attribute
attribute.description: Attribute containing the file path to analyze for extracting file system information

actions.description: Flatten Nested Object Attributes into Top-Level Attributes

attributes.description: Map/object attributes that should be flattened - their nested properties will become top-level attributes

actions.name: AttributeManager
actions.description: Gère les attributs

operations.title: Attribute Operations
operations.description: List of operations to perform on feature attributes (create, convert, rename, remove)

value.title: Value to use for the operation

actions.name: AttributeMapper
actions.description: Assigne des attributs

mappers.title: Attribute Mappers
mappers.description: List of mapping rules to transform attributes using expressions or value copying

valueAttribute.title: Attribute name to get value from

actions.name: BoundsExtractor
actions.description: Extrait les limites

xmax.title: Maximum X Attribute
xmax.description: Attribute name for storing the maximum X coordinate (defaults to "xmax")

xmin.title: Minimum X Attribute
xmin.description: Attribute name for storing the minimum X coordinate (defaults to "xmin")

ymax.title: Maximum Y Attribute
ymax.description: Attribute name for storing the maximum Y coordinate (defaults to "ymax")

ymin.title: Minimum Y Attribute
ymin.description: Attribute name for storing the minimum Y coordinate (defaults to "ymin")

zmax.title: Maximum Z Attribute
zmax.description: Attribute name for storing the maximum Z coordinate (defaults to "zmax")

zmin.title: Minimum Z Attribute
zmin.description: Attribute name for storing the minimum Z coordinate (defaults to "zmin")

actions.name: Bufferer
actions.description: Crée un tampon autour d'une géométrie

parameter.title: Bufferer Parameters
parameter.description: Configure how to create buffers around input geometries

bufferType.title: Buffer Type
bufferType.description: The type of buffer to create around the input geometry

distance.title: Distance
distance.description: The distance to extend the buffer from the original geometry (in coordinate units)

interpolationAngle.title: Interpolation Angle
interpolationAngle.description: The angle in degrees used for curve interpolation when creating rounded corners

oneOf.title: 2D Area Buffer
oneOf.description: Creates a 2D polygon buffer around the input geometry

actions.name: BulkAttributeRenamer
actions.description: Renomme des attributs en ajoutant/supprimant des préfixes ou suffixes, ou en remplaçant du texte

parameter.title: BulkAttributeRenamer Parameters
parameter.description: Configure how to rename feature attributes in bulk operations

renameAction.title: Rename Operation
renameAction.description: The type of renaming operation to perform on the attribute names

renameType.title: Which Attributes to Rename
renameType.description: Choose whether to rename all attributes or only selected ones

renameValue.title: Text Value
renameValue.description: The text to add as prefix/suffix, remove, or use as replacement

selectedAttributes.title: Selected Attribute Names
selectedAttributes.description: List of specific attribute names to rename (required when "Selected Attributes" is chosen)

textToFind.title: Text Pattern to Find
textToFind.description: Regular expression pattern to match when using "Replace Text" operation

oneOf.title: Add Prefix
oneOf.description: Add text to the beginning of attribute names

oneOf.title: Add Suffix
oneOf.description: Add text to the end of attribute names

oneOf.title: Remove Prefix
oneOf.description: Remove text from the beginning of attribute names

oneOf.title: Remove Suffix
oneOf.description: Remove text from the end of attribute names

oneOf.title: Replace Text
oneOf.description: Find and replace text using regular expressions

oneOf.title: All Attributes
oneOf.description: Rename all attributes in the feature

oneOf.title: Selected Attributes
oneOf.description: Rename only specific attributes listed below
